page.description: Helper class for downloading and uploading files to Google Drive.

property.name: namedResource
property.description: Named Resource to read credentials from.

property.name: folderId
property.description: The Id of the folder to list (if using list)

property.name: error
property.description: Error reported back from call (if call fails)

property.name: response
property.description: Raw curl response from google server.
